group_1.narration: After turning down Nayuta's request for an escort,@many things happened in rapid succession...

group_1.textRight: I heard somebody from the Union named@Ryo Midori died...

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.

group_1.textRight: The scramble for the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones has@gotten pretty serious.
Seems like every day there's a skirmish@someplace or another...

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.

group_1.textRight: We ought to be on the lookout, too.
Even if we're not in the Union, there's no@guarantee we won't get caught up in a fight.

group_1.textLeft: ...Uh-huh.

group_1.narration: I ignored all the information that reached my ears.@No matter what happened in Kamihama@or to Magical Girls we knew,@it was happening in a world that had nothing to do with us.
I didn't want to be unreasonable and put us in danger by@acting out of consideration for other people's situations.
That's why I couldn't understand...@...what Ayame was doing...

group_1.textLeft: ...Ayame, where are you off to again today?

group_1.textRight: Felicia's been actin' weird lately...and Kako's buddies@have been super busy...
So I've been sorta helpin' out just a@teensy, tiny bit...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Ayame...
You haven't joined the Union, have you...?

group_1.textRight: Wha...?

group_1.textLeft: You wouldn't think it's okay to do anything...
...as long as it's in the name of helping a friend,@would you...?

group_1.textRight: I don't, and I ain't joinin' the Union!
I promised you that I wouldn't...

group_1.textLeft: I see. That's fine, then...

group_1.textRight: ...Konoha, you've been actin' real weird lately...
It's like ya lost interest in the world around you...
You used to care more 'bout other Magical Girls...

group_1.textLeft: That's because that isn't necessary for the@three of us to live.

group_1.textRight: ...I don't think so...
If I know Kako and Felicia are in trouble,@I wanna help 'em...

group_1.textLeft: ...Helping others won't help us survive.
In fact, it's only a disadvantage, because it'll@expose us to danger...!

group_1.textRight: But, you said if there's anybody else in trouble,@I could help 'em...!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I said that... I said that, but...
For the sake of the three of us...@You mustn't do that...!
Stop helping others, Ayame...!

group_1.textRight: I know you're sayin' this 'cuz you're worried@'bout me, but...
I can't...put up with this anymore...!

group_1.textLeft: Ayame!

group_1.textRight: Whoa!
I'm back... [chara:302701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302701:cheek_0][chara:302701:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302701:lipSynch_1]Hey, what happened?@Did you two have a fight...?

group_1.textLeft: No... Ayame just doesn't understand what@she's doing...

group_1.narration: After Ayame ran away from home,@she got caught up in a fight between Magical Girls@while trying to protect her friends...

group_1.textLeft: No...it can't be true...!@This can't be happening...!

group_1.textRight: Why...
If she'd just sent us a message like she always did,@none of this would have happened...

group_1.textLeft: It's...it's my fault...
It was because of me...!@I denied Ayame's feelings...!
I said she shouldn't help her friends...!
That's why she was all alone...!
*Sob*!

group_1.narration: When Hazuki suggested that we become bodyguards@to survive as neutral Magical Girls without joining any group...
I was not only afraid of changing, but afraid that@the decision to change could end badly...
If I hadn't been so afraid,@and listened to Hazuki's suggestion@for us to become bodyguards,@Ayame's fate and our future@might have been different...
